Translations.Text: Ni$ lmumnin rebeen
Wid ipeallan s wannuz
wid ijunben yir awal
wid ipzekkin
wid ieurben af tuzzuft nnsen
siwa ar tlawin nnsen, ne$ taklatin nnsen. Akka, ur degsen tiyta
wid ib$an sennig waya, widak zegren tilisa
wid ipqadaren lamanat nnsen, u lemaahda nnsen
wid iwennaen tieilla nnsen
D wigi ay d iweooaten
wid ara iweoten Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Ni$ Nexleq amdan, seg ufuil n talaxt
sinna, Nerra t d tiqqit deg umekkan n laman
sinna, tiqqit Nxelq ip d argen; d$a, argen Nxelq it d acelleqluq; d$a, acelleqluq Nxelq it d i$san; d$a, Nessels aksum i yi$san. Sinna, Nxelq it d lxelq amaynut. Ad Ibarek Oebbi, Imxeyyeo ixellaqen
Sinna, deffir waya, war ccekk, a ppemmtem
Sinna, ih, ass n tnekra, a d tu$alem
Ni$ Nexleq, sennig wen, ua iberdan. Ur Nelli, $ef uxlaq, seg i$wefliyen
Nessader ed, seg igenni, aman s lmizan. Naateq iten di tmurt. Nezmer a ten Nessoue
Nxelq awen, yissen, leonanat n tezdayin akked teuoin; degsen, i kunwi, aias n yizwayen, teppeppem segsen
Akked ttejoa, id iff$en seg udrar n Sina. Teppak ed zzit u ddhin, i wid iteppen
Ih, di lmal, aselmed i kunwi. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg iaabbav nnsen. Aias n uba$uo degsen, i kunwi. Teppeppem segsen
Fellasen, u $ef lbabuo, ppawin kwen
